Sriram Anandraj wrote:

> Hi Robert/Vladimir,
>
> You both r right. Message is thrown only when the test fails.
> No matter whatever testrunner implementations we use.
>
> But is there any way to print my messages instead of a dot even when the test
> passes.

The messages are always termed to indicate something about the test failure, so
printing them on success would not be accurate.

Why might you want to print your messages instead of a dot when the test passes?

Mike
